faqs.question: Is CodeJudge free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, CodeJudge is completely free for practicing coding problems and tracking your progress. Premium features may be added in the future for structured learning and mentorship.

faqs.question: How is the difficulty level of problems determined?
faqs.answer: Difficulty levels are manually tagged based on the problem's logic complexity and expected time to solve, ranging from Easy to Hard.

faqs.question: Can I track my progress?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Your solved problems, submission history, and rating are saved to your profile so you can monitor your improvement over time.

faqs.question: What if I find a bug or mistake in a problem?
faqs.answer: You can report bugs through our feedback form or Discord server. We actively review reports and fix issues promptly.

faqs.question: Do you support multiple programming languages?
faqs.answer: Currently, we support C++, Python, JavaScript, and Java. More languages may be added based on user demand.

faqs.question: Is there a leaderboard or ranking system?
faqs.answer: Yes! You can compare your progress with peers via the global leaderboard and performance stats.

testimonials.name: Aditya Kumar
testimonials.text: CodeJudge helped me ace my FAANG interview! The structured problem sets and UI made daily practice fun.

testimonials.name: Umesh Kumar Verma
testimonials.text: The peer ranking and instant feedback gave me the push I needed to stay consistent and grow faster.

testimonials.name: Rahul M.
testimonials.text: From solving easy problems to cracking system design, CodeJudge is my daily go-to resource.

testimonials.name: Neha T.
testimonials.text: Love how intuitive the UI is and the problem tagging helps me focus on my weak areas.

features.title: Handpicked DSA Problems
features.description: Practice the most important DSA topics with handpicked problems to level up your skills.

features.title: Structured Courses
features.description: Step-by-step learning paths that get harder as you go, helping you master each concept.

features.title: Insightful Analytics
features.description: Track your progress, review your past attempts, and improve with clear insights.
